description.lang: TheAeotecbyAeonLabsMultiSensorGen5lookslike a motion sensor and itacts like one too.But its also so much more. Installing this 1 piece of Z-Wave technology isthe same as installing 4pieces ofZ-Wavetechnology.Your home control network will immediately understand motion, temperature, humidity and light readings wherever Multisensor installed. Those intelligent readings will equate to intelligenceautomation. And intelligent automation will give you the perfect, smart home.

Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate.The Motion sensor, Humidity sensor, thermometer and light sensor reports will be sent to the associated nodes in Group 1.

name.lang: Which report needs to be sent in Report group 1

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure to send the Humidity sensor, thermometer, light sensor and battery reports automatically in Report group 1.Note: The values corresponding to the first four bits of the parameter value may be combined to create different combinations of reports that you wish to have sent.For example, the temperature sensor report is the value 32 and the battery report is the value 1, so setting parameter 101 to a value of 33 will result in both temperature sensor report and battery report to be reported.See the full description of the parameter values for other possible settings.
The battery report is selected.
The temperature sensor report is selected.
The humidity sensor report is selected.
The light sensor report is selected.

name.lang: Which report needs to be sent in Report group 2.

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure to send the Humidity sensor, thermometer, light sensor and battery reports automatically in Report group 2.Note: The values corresponding to the first four bits of the parameter value may be combined to create different combinations of reports that you wish to have sent.For example, the temperature sensor report is the value 32 and the battery report is the value 1, so setting parameter 102 to a value of 33 will result in both temperature sensor report and battery report to be reported.See the full description of the parameter values for other possible settings.
The battery report is selected.
The temperature sensor report is selected.
The humidity sensor report is selected.
The light sensor report is selected.

name.lang: Which report needs to be sent in Report group 3.

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure to send the Humidity sensor, thermometer, light sensor and battery reports automatically in Report group 3.Note: The values corresponding to the first four bits of the parameter value may be combined to create different combinations of reports that you wish to have sent.For example, the temperature sensor report is the value 32 and the battery report is the value 1, so setting parameter 103 to a value of 33 will result in both temperature sensor report and battery report to be reported.See the full description of the parameter values for other possible settings.
The battery report is selected.
The temperature sensor report is selected.
The humidity sensor report is selected.
The light sensor report is selected.

name.lang: The interval time of sending reports in Report group 1

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure the interval time of the sensor report in Report group 1.
The range of interval time is 5 to 2678400.

name.lang: The interval time of sending reports in Report group 2.

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure the interval time of the sensor report in Report group 2.
The range of interval time is 5 to 2678400.

name.lang: The interval time of sending reports in Report group 3

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure the interval time of the sensor report in Report group 3.
The range of interval time is 5 to 2678400.

name.lang: Enable/Disable waking up for 10 minutes when re-power on (battery mode) the MultiSensor.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable waking up for 10 minutes when re-power on (battery mode) the MultiSensor.1. Value = 0, disable.2. Value =others, enable.
Disable waking up for 10 minutes when re-power on (battery mode) the MultiSensor.
Enable waking up for 10 minutes when re-power on (battery mode) the MultiSensor.

name.lang: Enable/disable all configuration parameters to be locked

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable all configuration parameters to be locked.(0 =disable, 1 = enable)
Disable all configuration parameters to be locked.
Enable all configuration parameters to be locked.
This parameter is used to reset product to default factory setting. (There are just 2 values can be used).
Reset the product to default factory setting and be excluded from the Z-wave network.
Resets all configuration parameters to default setting.

This parameter is used to set the timeout for the motion sensor.Note:(1), The time unit is second if the value range is in 1 to 255. (2), If the value range is in 256 to 15300, the time unit will be minute and its value should follow the below rules:a),Interval time =Value/60, if the interval time can be divided by 60 and without remainder.b), Interval time= (Value/60) +1, if the interval time can be divided by 60 and has remainder.(3), Other values will be ignored.
The unit of timeout is second.
The unit of timeout is minute.

name.lang: Enable/disable the function of motion sensor.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable the function of motion sensor.1. Value=0, disable.2. Value=1, enable.
Disable the function of motion sensor.
Enable the function of motion sensor.

name.lang: Enable/disable the selective reporting only when measurements reach a certain threshold or percentage set in 41-44 below.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable the selective reporting only when measurements reach a certain threshold or percentage set in the parameter 41 to 44.This is used to reduce network traffic.(0 == disable, 1 == enable)
Disable the selective reporting.
Enable the selective reporting.

name.lang: Threshold change in temperature to induce an automatic report.

description.lang: Threshold change in temperature to induce an automatic report. Note:1. When the unit is Celsius, threshold=Value.2. When the unit is Fahrenheit, threshold=Value*1.8The accuracy is 0.1.
Threshold of temperature.

name.lang: Threshold change in humidity to induce an automatic report.

description.lang: Threshold change in humidity to induce an automatic report.
Threshold of humidity

name.lang: Threshold change in luminance to induce an automatic report.

description.lang: Threshold change in luminance to induce an automatic report.
Threshold of luminance

name.lang: Threshold change in battery level to induce an automatic report.

description.lang: Threshold change in battery level to induce an automatic report.
Threshold of battery level.

name.lang: Enable/disable to send the alarm report of low temperature

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable to send the alarm report of low temperature(<-15)1, Value=0, disable.2, Value=1, enable(Note:The MultiSensor will report the Multi Level Temperature CC with the value=0xFFFF to controller if the current temperature is less than -15).
Disable to send the alarm report of low temperature(&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;-15)
Enable to send the alarm report of low temperature(&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;-15)

name.lang: Which command would be sent when the motion sensor triggered.

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure that which command would be sent when the motion sensor triggered.1. Value=1, send Basic Set CC.2. Value=2, send Sensor Binary Report CC.
Send Basic Set CC.
Send Sensor Binary Report CC.
